1237.question: What languages are represented in the dataset?
1237.response: {'Answer': 'The dataset represents various languages such as English (EN), Japanese (JA), Spanish (ES), Arabic (AR), Portuguese (PT), Korean (KO), Thai (TH), French (FR), Turkish (TR), Russian (RU), Italian (IT), German (DE), Polish (PL), Dutch (NL), Greek (EL), Swedish (SV), Persian (FA), Vietnamese (VI), Filipino (FI), Catalan (CS), Ukrainian (UK), Hindi (HI), Danish (DA), Hungarian (HU), Norwegian (NO), Romanian (RO), Serbian (SR), Estonian (EU), Latvian (LV), Bulgarian (BG), Urdu (UR), Tamil (TA), Burmese (MR), Brunei Malay (BN), Indonesian (IN), Kannada (KN), Estonian (ET), Slovenian (SL), Guarani (GU), Cebuano (CY), Chinese (ZH), Chakma (CKB), Icelandic (IS), Lithuanian (LT), Malay (ML), Sinhala (SI), Hebrew (IW), Nepali (NE), Khmer (KM), Myanmar (MY), Tagalog (TL), and Kazakh (KA).'}
1237.answer: EN, JA, ES, AR, PT, KO, TH, FR, TR, RU, IT, DE, PL, NL, EL, SV, FA, VI, FI, CS, UK, HI, DA, HU, NO, RO, SR, LV, BG, UR, TA, MR, BN, IN, KN, ET, SL, GU, CY, ZH, CKB, IS, LT, ML, SI, IW, NE, KM, MY, TL, KA, BO
